Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Jason Bere
Dear Sir,
Jason Bere is doing pretty good at A Jupiter Hammerheads!
He has an ERA of 2.77, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Rey Sanchez
Dear Sir,
Rey Sanchez shouldn't play at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .245 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
